channel.title: generative on CBayes
channel.description: Recent content in generative on CBayes

item.title: Minature Generative Art
item.description: Sometimes something simple can turn out to generate the most beautiful things. Following you will find a few lines of code that present a beautiful pattern. Oval Curve n <- 300 t1 <- 1:n t0 <- seq(3,2*n+1,2) %% n t2 <- t0 + (t0 == 0)*n df <- data.frame(x = cos((t1-1)*2*pi/n), y = sin((t1-1)*2*pi/n), x2 = cos((t2-1)*2*pi/n), y2 = sin((t2-1)*2*pi/n)) ggplot(df,aes(x,y,xend = x2,yend = y2)) + geom_segment(alpha = .
